name: attachment_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new file is uploaded by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered anytime a file is uploaded into a course or user file directory.

schema.attachment_id: The Canvas id of the attachment.
schema.context_id: The id of the context the attachment is used in.
schema.context_type: The type of context the attachment is used in.
schema.display_name: The display name of the attachment. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.filename: The file name of the attachment. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.folder_id: The id of the folder where the attachment was saved.
schema.lock_at: The lock date (attachment is locked after this date).
schema.unlock_at: The unlock date (attachment is unlocked after this date).
schema.updated_at: The time at which this attachment was last modified in any way.
schema.user_id: The Canvas id of the user associated with the attachment.
